description: Boots that withstand snowy, wintery conditions. They're waterproof and insulated for long outdoor treks or for shovelling out the drive.Full-grain, waterproof leather upper.Waterproof membrane keeps feet dry in any weather.Insulated with 400g of PrimaLoft® insulation.PET Fleece lining is made entirely from recycled plastic bottles.Fully gusseted tongue helps keep out debris.Rustproof D-ring hardware on lacing system.Shock-absorbing EVA midsole provides cushioning.Rubber lug outsole is made with recycled rubber.
name: Timberland Chillberg Tall Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
